comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > adguard seems to be preventing youtube from working. When I turn adguard off, youtube videos load, but when I turn adguard on, youtube videos don't load the website gives me an "you are offline" message. I confirmed this is not an issue with youtbe, as when I use chrome with uBlock Origin at the same time, it works perfectly. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ka5sk4fxtpso8wkg4084g00scc84kc4jwnbj4q8tk0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/12kyanj31shcs8woc448k8804c0ggog70wa4s6aqww.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.14 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ghclp6szi9s0c8woscogs0w80og0ggsds7aguah22o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tfx68g4v7tw4wkkg0g0s44go0o88sc4dmcps04vezs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Duck Duck Go Privacy Essentials, Return Youtube Disklike Button, Youtube-shorts block, CustomTube, and Replace Youtube's Home with Subscriptions

issue.title: kaoskrew.org
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://kaoskrew.org/viewtopic.php?p=30386&sid=f2ab70ceb692db31a9a8aacef6f4cfd2#p30386

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>Click on anywhere on the page and there will be a popup. 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/db6a97f9-55e5-43a9-9f99-9395a8c8af14)


</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots

issue.title: aternos.org

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://aternos.org/server/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faternos.org%2Fserver%2F) ### Comment Username: @Don-7x > Every time when this website is loaded or refreshed the anti adblock script is annoying me ._. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.tokyo-sports.co.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/articles/-/270335?page=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tokyo-sports.co.jp%2Farticles%2F-%2F270335%3Fpage%3D1) ### Comment > It was not possible to distinguish whether it was an erroneous block or a mobile app banner. > > When the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter is enabled, clicking on the banner with the red arrow does not move the page between screenshots 1, 2 and 3, but stops at the white screen in screenshot 2. > > @@||google-analytics.com/analytics.js$domain=yappli.plus > Adding the above rule to the user filter works. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ps7d9kmk3uskck8owkcgsscc8o48kkcc3o3rzj40c8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/833vfymltbk8sg0kk0kc4gw4wo84s4so9pns3oyslc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pg2mubg98z4oswcocog0go0wocgowookvtf9uvniao.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 33 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.1.101;4.1.101 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320),
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180) DNS filtering: | server: `System`
Filters: | Privacy:
